oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. French. National Women's Party letter, January 24, 1923.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Joan Grayson, Press Representative, National Women's Party, Washington, D.C., to Mrs. L. Crozier French, 620 W. Cumberland Avenue, Knoxville, TN. Re: publicity for Miss Mary Winsor's visit to Knoxville on Frbeuary 22. January 24, 1923. Lizzie Crozier French Papers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Women's rights; Correspondence; Organizations;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Joan Grayson, National Women's Party
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
